TopicTitle: HAPPY NEW YEARS! - Have any KSP new year resolutions?

Articles.Content:
~*Happy new years!*~

I spent the early evening experimenting with new plane designs and making music for this project, went to a short party with a few school friends, and then spent the new years with my family and my girlfriend (Who I need to convince to make a rocket in KSP >.

What'd you do for the new year? And do you have any new years Kerbal resolutions?

I promise to never leave any kerbals stranded *alone* in the year 2015.

I'm at work.

My resolution is to kill less kerbals.
I'm going to start my rocket building company.

New years resolution: 1920x1080

...Dang, I was going to say that. Oh well, that joke's gotten old anyhow.

I will strand LESS kerbals on Bop!

So far, I have stranded one kerbal on Bop.

Oh, and finally find a part mod idea i'm happy with and think is good enough for release.

I'm going to finally plant a flag on all planets in the Kerbol system like I said I would do for long time now, and use only my career playthrough to do so.

Happy New Years btw.

I plan to finish career mode, land on every planet, and do a grand tour in 0.90. Usually I never get too far because I always update to the new version but I feel like I'm going to stay on 0.90 for this career mode until I feel like I'm ready to update.
My resolution is to land on more places outside Kerbin's SOI than just Gilly.
